input.label: Select Process
input.populatingSearch: index=extnet sourcetype=log | rex "\s<(?<errLevel>\w+):(?<errLoc>\w+)\.(?<errType>\w+)>\s" | search errLevel=Crit errLoc=Kern errType="Alert" | transaction host maxspan=0.2s maxpause=1s startswith="Code:" endswith="died" | rex "\sProcess\s(?<dumpProcess>\w+)\spid\s(?<dumpPid>\d+)\sdied\swith\ssignal\s(?<dumpSignal>\d+)" | dedup _time,host,dumpProcess

table.title: Process Crashes
table.searchString: index=extnet sourcetype=log | rex "\s<(?<errLevel>\w+):(?<errLoc>\w+)\.(?<errType>\w+)>\s" | search errLevel=Crit errLoc=Kern errType="Alert" | transaction host maxspan=0.2s maxpause=1s startswith="Code:" endswith="died" | rex "\sProcess\s(?<dumpProcess>\w+)\spid\s(?<dumpPid>\d+)\sdied\swith\ssignal\s(?<dumpSignal>\d+)" | dedup _time,host,dumpProcess | search dumpProcess=$form.dumpProcess$ | join type=outer dumpPid [search index=extnet sourcetype=debug | rex "\s+pid\s+(?<dumpPid>\d+)\s+" | rex "\s+epc\s+:\s+(?<epc>\w+)\s+"] | eval eventTime=strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | eval epc=if(isnotnull(epc),epc,"EPC data not recorded") | table eventTime host dumpProcess dumpSignal epc | sort -eventTime | rename eventTime as "Time" host as "IP Address" dumpProcess as "Process" dumpSignal as "Signal" epc as "EPC"
